column5: Anyone know if "they" are letting US resort owners cross ?

Our outfitter is from Wisconsin and they came across several(i believe 4) weeks ago. 14 day self quarantine before being able to go out into camps and get things ready. So yes, theyve been able to for awhile now. We are fly in on monday 14th for a week. just to clarify, our group are all from Ontario.
Good luck Glenn,you probably won't need it though,have fun

Thanks, appreciate it. Believe me, our group know how fortunate we are and are very grateful to be able to be going on this trip considering. We are also glad to be helping out our outfitter . We totally get the concept that for us, its a fish trip....for the outfitters, its a way of life.
